item.description:
@amzinaiscape wrote:

Hello All

Im not trying to be spoon fed. Ive been searching for about two hours looking through the code and on google trying to fix it myself first, if anyone can help in any way I would be grateful.

Basically Every time someone dies admin or normal player they cant see the items they drop when they go back to them however others can see them and pick them up. I would like to make it so when you die you can return and pick up your items here is the code below.

Apply Dead Method:

public void applyDead() { client.isDeadWaiting = true; client.isDeadTimer = 5; client.getActionAssistant().startAnimation(AnimationManager.getDeathAnimation(client)); client.setBusy(true); client.setCanWalk(false); client.getActionAssistant().resetKeepItems(); client.attackTimer = 5; client.poisonHitdmg = 0; client.getActionAssistant().musicManager("PLAY", 203); if(client.prayerActive[21]){ client.gfx0(437); } if(client.duelingWithID > 0){ Client o = (Client) Server.getPlayerManager().players[client.duelingWithID]; if(o != null){ if(o.duelArea1() || o.duelArea2()){ if(o.isDeadWaiting){ o.isDeadWaiting = false; } o.isDuelWinner = true; o.isDead = false; client.playerLevel[3] = client.getActionAssistant().getLevelForXP(client.playerXP[3]); client.getDueling().duelVictory(o); } else if(client.acceptedFUNDuel){ if(o.isDeadWaiting){ o.isDeadWaiting = false; } o.acceptedFUNDuel = false; o.FUNDuelPoints++; o.setCanWalk(true); o.getActionAssistant().follow(0, 3, 1); o.disableAttEvt = false; int message = Misc.random(4); switch(message) { case 0: o.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" falls before your might."); break; case 1: o.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" has won a free ticket to Lumbridge."); break; case 2: o.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You were clearly a better fighter than "+client.playerName+"."); break; case 3: o.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" falls before your might."); break; case 4: o.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You have defeated "+client.playerName+"."); break; } } } } }

Give Life Method

public void giveLife() { for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++){ client.playerLevel[i] = client.getActionAssistant().getLevelForXP(client.playerXP[i]); client.getActionAssistant().refreshSkill(i); } int X = Constants.SPAWN_X+Misc.random(12), Y = Constants.SPAWN_Y+Misc.random(7); /*if(X == 3223 && Y == 3217 || X == 3223 && Y == 3220){ X = 3222; Y = 3218; }*/ client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("Oh dear, you are dead!"); client.isDead = false; client.isDeadWaiting = false; client.teleportToX = X; client.teleportToY = Y; client.setHeightLevel(Constants.SPAWN_Z); client.getActionAssistant().startAnimation(-1); client.specAmount = 10; if(!client.isSkulled){ client.getActionAssistant().keepItem(0, true); client.getActionAssistant().keepItem(1, true); client.getActionAssistant().keepItem(2, true); if(client.prayerActive[10]) { client.getActionAssistant().keepItem(3, true); } } else { if(client.prayerActive[10]) { client.getActionAssistant().keepItem(1, true); } } client.getCombatManager().dropItems(); client.getActionAssistant().deleteAllItems(); for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) { if(client.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) { client.getActionAssistant().addItem(client.itemKeptId[i1], 1); } } if(client.prayerActive[10]) { // if we have protect items if(client.itemKeptId[3] > 0) { client.getActionAssistant().addItem(client.itemKeptId[3], 1); } } client.getActionAssistant().resetPrayers(); client.getCombatManager().calculateBonus(); client.getCombat().getMethods().sendWeapon(client); client.headIcon = 0; client.isSkulled = false; client.skullDelay = 0; client.skulledBy = null; client.attackTimer = 1; client.playerStandIndex = 0x328; client.setCanWalk(true); client.setBusy(false); }

drop item method in CombatManager.java

public void dropItems() { Client highestHitter = null; int highestHit = -1; for (Map.Entry<Client, Integer> entry : previousAttackers.entrySet()) { if (entry.getValue() > highestHit) { highestHit = entry.getValue(); highestHitter = entry.getKey(); } } for(int i = 0; i < client.playerItems.length; i++) { if(client.playerItems[i] <= 0) continue; FloorItem item = new FloorItem((client.playerItems[i]-1), client.playerItemsN[i], highestHitter, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); if(destroyItem(item.getId())) { item = new FloorItem(item.getId(), 1, client, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); Server.getItemManager().newPrivateDrop(item, client); continue; } if(item.getId() == -1 || item == null) { continue; } String name = Server.getItemManager().getItemDefinition(item.getId()).getName(); if((name.startsWith("Ahrims") || name.startsWith("Dharoks") || name.startsWith("Guthans") || name.startsWith("Karils") || name.startsWith("Torags") || name.startsWith("Veracs")) && !name.endsWith("0")){ item = new FloorItem(Item.switchBarrowsItems(item.getId()), 1, highestHitter, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); } if(highestHitter != null) { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, highestHitter); } else { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, null); Server.getItemManager().showDrop(item); } } for(int i = 0; i < client.playerEquipment.length; i++) { if(client.playerEquipment[i] <= 0) continue; FloorItem item = new FloorItem(client.playerEquipment[i], client.playerEquipmentN[i], highestHitter, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); if(destroyItem(item.getId())){ item = new FloorItem(client.playerEquipment[i], client.playerEquipmentN[i], client, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); Server.getItemManager().newPrivateDrop(item, client); continue; } String name = Server.getItemManager().getItemDefinition(item.getId()).getName(); if((name.startsWith("Ahrims") || name.startsWith("Dharoks") || name.startsWith("Guthans") || name.startsWith("Karils") || name.startsWith("Torags") || name.startsWith("Veracs")) && !name.endsWith("0")){ item = new FloorItem(Item.switchBarrowsItems(item.getId()), 1, highestHitter, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); } if(highestHitter != null) { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, highestHitter); } else { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, null); Server.getItemManager().showDrop(item); } } if(highestHitter != null) { highestHitter.PlayerKills++; client.PlayerDeaths++; int message = Misc.random(4); switch(message) { case 0: highestHitter.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" falls before your might."); break; case 1: highestHitter.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" has won a free ticket to Lumbridge."); break; case 2: highestHitter.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You were clearly a better fighter than "+client.playerName+"."); break; case 3: highestHitter.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(client.playerName +" falls before your might."); break; case 4: highestHitter.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You have defeated "+client.playerName+"."); break; } } FloorItem item = new FloorItem(526, 1, highestHitter, client.getAbsX(), client.getAbsY(), client.getHeightLevel(), client.currentRegion); if(highestHitter != null) { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, highestHitter); } else { Server.getItemManager().newDrop(item, null); Server.getItemManager().showDrop(item); } client.getActionAssistant().resetItems(); client.updateRequired = true; client.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; previousAttackers = null; }

Any hints or suggestion would be excellent.

Thank you so much for reading and if you can helping.

Sincerely James ;D
